entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
